name: Moon Ride
description:
@me

This is my submission for the Weekly Game Jam 224. The theme was Around The World.

I made the art and the code.
Music come from Ted Kerr at https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-theme-on-the-offensive

As the moon, you have to turn around earth but you don't want human pollution.

Controls

Maintain Spacebar to accelerate and avoid the pollutions smog
